Trade/Device Name(s): CR3 Keyless Split Sample Cup Amphetamine-Cocaine
CR² Keyless Split Sample Cup Amphetamine-Cocaine
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CR3 Keyless Split Sample Cup Amphetamine-Cocaine rapid test for qualitative detection of amphetamine and cocaine metabolites in human urine
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid qualitative detection of d-Amphetamine and Benzoylecgonine (major metabolites of amphetamine and cocaine) in human urine at cutoffs of 1000 ng/mL and 300 ng/mL, for in vitro diagnostic, over-the-counter and prescription use
